name: bulk-extractor
description:
---
`bulk-extractor` is a digital forensics tool used for file extraction (file carving) and evidence collection.

---
##### Usage

Use `bulk-extractor` on any sample with suspected embedded or encoded content. Valid target samples may include disk images, archive files, or PCAPs. This tool will not work on samples that have been encrypted.

---
##### Status

`bulk_extractor` is actively maintained and the project receives monthly updates.

---
##### Documentation

[https://github.com/simsong/bulk_extractor](https://github.com/simsong/bulk_extractor)
